attributes.action: Abolish the petition - EU Referendum Rules triggering a 2nd EU Referendum
attributes.additional_details: Democracy should be finalised by what the majority percieves to be their true vote. Any petition signed rejecting a democratic vote and that is bent on destroying the rights of a democratic vote should be deemed void. All petitions that deem a majority vote as invalid should be rejected.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to implement a rule, and find that a vote is final and that petitions against , is discrimination against a democratic vote. This petition is to instill the strong nature of democracy at its core and to strengthen that a majority vote wins.
